zetas-module-suite.zetas-dark-mode.title: Zeta's Drak Mode Settings
zetas-module-suite.zetas-dark-mode.name: Enable Dark Mode
zetas-module-suite.zetas-dark-mode.hint: Enable the dark mode from Zeta's Module Suite.
zetas-module-suite.zetas-dir-changes.hin: Enable this setting to make the right-hand sidetab more compact and modern.
zetas-module-suite.zetas-rolltype-button: Enable this setting to display buttons instead of a dropdown for the rolltype selection.
zetas-module-suite.archive-delete-permis: Define what players can archive or delete the chat-log via Rolltype Buttons (permissions have to be set correctly).
